data.title: Sheraton & Le Meridien Charlotte Hotel Complex - Charlotte, NC Meeting Venues and Event Space
data.meta_description: Sheraton & Le Meridien Charlotte Hotel Complex is located in the Uptown area of Charlotte, NC. Our hotels feature comfortable guest rooms and all standard amenities for your stay. Guests will enjoy easy access to all the nearby local area attractions
data.text:
More

Work and play in downtown style at Sheraton & Le Meridien Charlotte Hotel Complex. Our Charlotte hotels are one mile from the Charlotte Convention Center hosting innovative expositions by day and the Spectrum Center for local NBA team game by night. Join the excitement of a football game at Bank of America Stadium before returning to our uptown hotel for memorable dinner at Red Salt by David Burke. We offer more than 65,000 square feet of event space, with room for up to 1,800 guests for business and social occasions. Our outdoor pools and on-site fitness center keep you active no matter the weather in Charlotte. At the end of the day, take in stunning 360 views of the Queen City skyline at our rooftop bar, City Lights, then head to the Social Bar + Kitchen restaurant for a relaxing meal with friends. Our hotel complex offers modern style and amenities, including free Wi-Fi and Sheraton Sleep Experience bedding. Wake up to a view of the uptown skyline during your stay at Sheraton & Le Meridien Charlotte Hotel Complex.
